spec_data.Name: fusioninventory-agent-yum-plugin
spec_data.Description:
fusioninventory-agent-yum-plugin asks the running service agent to send an
inventory when yum exits.

This requires the service to be running with the --rpc-trust-localhost option.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 14 Aug 2017 02:36:10 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ask FusionInventory agent to send an inventory when yum exits
